Paragraph: 11 The mobility of PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) was measured by using a field - effect transistor ( FET ) with a bottom-gate , top - contact device configuration built on an n - doped silicon wafer.

| n-doped silicon wafer |

Explanation:

* PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) is a material mentioned in the paragraph as the one whose mobility was measured.
* The n-doped silicon wafer is also a material mentioned in the paragraph as the substrate on which the FET device was built.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 11 The mobility of PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) was measured by using a field - effect transistor ( FET ) with a bottom-gate , top - contact device configuration built on an n - doped silicon wafer.

Let's think step by step.

mobility of PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu)
field-effect transistor (FET)
bottom-gate
top-contact device configuration

Note: I have identified the following property names from the given paragraph:

* mobility of PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu)
* field-effect transistor (FET)
* bottom-gate
* top-contact device configuration
* n-doped silicon wafer

These are the entities that are referred to as properties or characteristics in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Property Name
-----------------
mobility of PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu)
n-doped

Note: I have identified the following material properties from the given paragraph:

* mobility of PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu)
* n-doped

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as field-effect transistor (FET), bottom-gate, top-contact device configuration, and silicon wafer, are not material properties. They are devices or components used to measure the mobility of PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu). Therefore, I have removed them from the list.

The mobility of a material is a measure of how quickly charge carriers can move through it. In this case, the mobility of PDTP-DTDPP-(Bu) is being measured.

The term "n-doped" refers to a type of doping in which a material is modified by adding impurities that have more valence electrons than the host material. This is a material property that affects the electrical conductivity of the material.
